articles.author: John L. Dorman
articles.title: Elon Musk says he wants 'zero' tariffs between the US and Europe - Business Insider
articles.description: Musk during a talk with Italian Deputy Prime Minister Matteo Salvini said he'd like to see a "free trade zone" between Europe and the US.
articles.content: Elon Musk on Saturday said he'd like to see a "zero-tariff" system between the United States and Europe, days after President Donald Trump implemented baseline "reciprocal" tariffs on dozens of tradi… [+977 chars]
